S04jnalokau:1_0: namo buddhāya // evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
S04jnalokau:1_1: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate 'nantaratnaśikhare dharmadhātugarbhe prāsāde mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcaviṃśatibhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ /
S04jnalokau:1_2_0: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ
S04jnalokau:1_2_1: kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ /
S04jnalokau:1_6: dhanaśriyā ca buddhiśriyā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamudgatena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04jnalokau:3_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata etad abhūt /
S04jnalokau:3_1: yan nv ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahājavabalavegasthāmasaṃjananārthaṃ dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayeyam,
S04jnalokau:3_2: yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo mahaujaskamahaujaskān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃnipāteyam /
S04jnalokau:3_3: yan nv ahaṃ mahādharmanirdeśasya paridīpanāyai nimittam ādarśayeyam,
S04jnalokau:3_4: mahāntam avabhāsaṃ kuryām / yan me bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatya mahādharmanirdeśaṃ paripṛccheyur iti /
S04jnalokau:4_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyācintyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamaṃ lokadhātuṃ mahāraśmimeghair avabhāsayati sma /
S04jnalokau:5_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchanti sma /
S04jnalokau:5_1_0: [JĀA_21] teṣām ekaiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'cintyābhir bodhisattvavikurvaṇābhir āgatya bhagavato 'nurūpām acintyāṃ pūjāṃ
S04jnalokau:5_1_1: kṛtvā svakasvakapraṇidhānabalanirjāteṣu padmāsaneṣu bhagavataḥ purato nyaṣīdan /
S04jnalokau:7_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmadhātugarbhe prāsādamadhye mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04jnalokau:7_6: tasya ca mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanasyopari samantād daśāsaṃkhyeyāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S04jnalokau:7_7: te ca raśmayo daśasu dikṣv anyonyān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
S04jnalokau:8_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśadiśy ekaikasmād digbhāgād daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
S04jnalokau:8_3: kecid muktāmayaiḥ, kecid vajramayaiḥ, kecid vajraprabhāsamaṇiratnamayaiḥ,
S04jnalokau:8_9: āgatya ca bhagavato 'cintyātulyāmāpyāṃ parimāṇābhikrāntāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S04jnalokau:8_11: niṣīdya bhagavantam animiṣaṃ nirīkṣantaḥ sthitā abhūvan /
S04jnalokau:9_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04jnalokau:9_1: nānāmahāmaṇiratnavṛkṣair divyaiḥ puṣpavṛkṣair vastravṛkṣair uragasāracandanagandhavṛkṣair alaṃkṛtaḥ,
S04jnalokau:12_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tato mahāmaṇiratnapadmagarbhāt siṃhāsanād imā gāthā niścaranti sma /
S04jnalokau:13_0: āgaccha niṣīda narendrarājā ahaṃ hi te puṇyabalena udgataḥ /
S04jnalokau:13_1: saṃpūrṇasaṃkalpa ahaṃ tvam adya saṃdhārayiṣye dvipadottamaṃ jinam // 1 //
S04jnalokau:13_2: mamātmabhāvo ratanāmayo hy ayaṃ ratnaikapadmaṃ mama madhyasaṃsthitam /
S04jnalokau:13_3: manoramaṃ tubhya kṛtena nāyakāḥ saṃkalpa pūrehi mamādya tāyinaḥ // 2 //
S04jnalokau:13_4: niṣadya ratnāmayi padmi asmiṃ śobhehi māṃ sarvam imaṃ ca lokam /
S04jnalokau:13_5: deśehi dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ yaṃ śruta siṃhāsana īdṛśaṃ labhet // 3 //
S04jnalokau:13_6: raśmī sahasrā tava gātrasaṃbhavāḥ prabhāsayanto bahulokadhātum /
S04jnalokau:13_7: prāmodyajātasya hi lakṣaṇaṃ imaṃ samākramā mahya kṛtena nāyakāḥ // 4 //
S04jnalokau:13_9: kṣipraṃ niṣīdasva kuruṣva 'nugrahaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā dhārita aṣṭakoṭiyaḥ /
S04jnalokau:13_10: asmin pradeśe munināṃ svayaṃbhuvāṃ bhagavan pīhādya karotv anugraham // 5 //
S04jnalokau:15_0: atha khalu bhagavān utthāya pūrvakād āsanāt tatra mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣadya paryaṅkaṃbaddhī sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ svavalokayati sma /
S04jnalokau:15_1: sāmutkarṣikāyāś ca dharmadeśanāyās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nimittam akārṣīt /
S04jnalokau:16_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa evaṃ cintayati sma /
S04jnalokau:16_1: yan nv ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'nutpādānirodhaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchet,
S04jnalokau:17_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato 'ntikān nimittaṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya bhagavantam etad avocat /
S04jnalokau:19_5: samāgateme bahubodhisattvā jñānārthinaḥ tvāṃ ca vibho 'bhivanditum /
S04jnalokau:19_6: saṃpreṣitā lokavināyakebhir deśehi saddharmam udāram uttamam // 3 //
S04jnalokau:21_0: evam ukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat /
S04jnalokau:21_1: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ, sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ mañjuśrīs tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
S04jnalokau:21_2_0: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca
S04jnalokau:21_2_1: manuṣyāṇāṃ caitarhy āgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhabhūmiprāpaṇārtham /
S04jnalokau:21_3: anuttrāsas te mañjuśrīr asmin sthāne yogaḥ karaṇīyo na [JĀA_26] bhayaṃ na stambhitatvam /
S04jnalokau:21_7: tadyathā mañjuśrīr iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī mahāvaiḍūryamayī saṃsthitā bhavet /
S04jnalokau:21_8: evaṃ ca saṃsthitā bhaved yathā tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya,
S04jnalokau:21_9: śakrasya devānām indrasya, vaijayantasya ca prāsādasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyet /
S04jnalokau:21_10: śakraś ca devānām indras tatra divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayan saṃdṛśyet /
S04jnalokau:22_0: atha tasmin samaye devāḥ sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃcodayeyuḥ /
S04jnalokau:22_1: āgacchatha bho naranāryaḥ / paśyatemaṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ vaijayante prāsāde divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantam /
S04jnalokau:22_5: īdṛśeṣu vaijayanteṣu prāsādeṣu krīḍiṣyatha ramiṣyatha paricārayiṣyatha śakratvāni ca kariṣyatha /
S04jnalokau:22_7: yādṛśyā ca śakro devānām indro divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūta iti /
S04jnalokau:23_0: atha mañjuśrīs te strīpuruṣadārakadārikās tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya,
S04jnalokau:23_1: vaijayantasya prāsādasya, śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvāñjalipragṛhaṃ kuryuḥ /
S04jnalokau:23_2: puṣpāṇi ca kṣiperan [JĀA_27] gandhāṃś ca kṣiperann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante /
S04jnalokau:23_3: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ,
S04jnalokau:23_4: vayam apy evaṃ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema ramema parivārayema yathāyaṃ śakro devānām indra iti /
S04jnalokau:24_0: na ca te sattvā evaṃ saṃjānanti sma /
S04jnalokau:24_2: vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, śakraś ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyata iti /
S04jnalokau:24_3: te śakratvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati,
S04jnalokau:24_4: puṇyāni ca kurvanti, śīlaṃ ca samādāya vartante / tatra ca trayastriṃśadbhavane pratibhāsa upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti /
S04jnalokau:25_0: yathā mañjuśrīḥ tatra ca vaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ nāsti tatra trayastriṃśadbhavanam,
S04jnalokau:25_1: na vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, na ca śakro devānām indraḥ / api tu pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya saṃdṛśyate trayastriṃśadbhavanam,
S04jnalokau:25_2: vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ, śakrasya devānām indraḥ / sa cāsan notpanno na niruddhaḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
S04jnalokau:26_0: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pariśuddhatvāc cittasya subhāvitatvād bhāvanāyāḥ sattvānāṃ tathāgatātmabhāvadarśanaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:26_2: sa cābhūto 'nutpanno 'niruddho na bhāvo nābhāvo na dṛśyo nādṛśyo na lokyo nālokyo na caityo nācaityo na san nāsan /
S04jnalokau:27_0: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvās tathāgatapratibhāsam ārambaṇīkṛtvā puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
S04jnalokau:27_2: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante / vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
S04jnalokau:27_4: puṇyāni ca kurvanti, śīlaṃ ca samādāya vartante / tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ tathāgatajñānapratilambhāya [JĀA_28] pariṇāmayanti /
S04jnalokau:27_5: tadyathā mañjuśrīs tatra mahāvaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāso neñjati,
S04jnalokau:27_6_0: na manyate, na prapañcayati, na kalpayati, na vikalpayati / akalpo 'vikalpo 'cintyo 'manasikāraḥ śāntaḥ śītībhūto 'nutpādo
S04jnalokau:28_0: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho neñjati,
S04jnalokau:28_1_0: na manyate, na prapañcayati, na kalpayati, na vikalpayati / akalpo 'vikalpo 'cintyo 'manasikāraḥ śāntaḥ śītībhūto 'nutpādo
S04jnalokau:28_3: atha ca pratibimba iva lokeṣu dṛśyate /
S04jnalokau:30_0: tadyathā mañjuśrīr devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ puṇyabalapariniṣpannānāṃ dharmaśabdānāṃ mahādharmadundubhir upari vaijayantasya prasādasyāntarīkṣagatā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntā,
S04jnalokau:31_0: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhiḥ /
S04jnalokau:31_1: yasmin [JĀA_29] samaye devās trayastriṃśatkāyikā tīvrasatatasamitaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ pramattā bhavanti,
S04jnalokau:31_2: na bhūyaḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmaṃ saṃgāyanti,
S04jnalokau:31_3: śakraś ca yadā devānām indro divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍaratiparibhogaiḥ pramatto bhavati,
S04jnalokau:32_0: tasmin samaye mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhir adṛṣyā cānālokyā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāntarīkṣagatā tādṛśaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayati /
S04jnalokau:32_1: yena ca dharmaśabdena sarvān trayastriṃśatkāyikān devān svareṇa vijñapayati /
S04jnalokau:32_2: anityā mārṣā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā mā pramattacāriṇo bhavatha /
S04jnalokau:32_6: śūnyā mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārā mā pramādam āpadyatha /
S04jnalokau:32_7: duḥkham itaś cyavitānāṃ punar atropapattir bhaviṣyati /
S04jnalokau:32_8: saṃgāyata mārṣā dharmam, dharmārāmaratiratā bhavatha dharmasārāḥ,
S04jnalokau:32_9: dharmanimnāḥ, dharmapravaṇāḥ, dharmānusmṛtimanasikārāḥ / mārṣā viharatha yūyaṃ punar ebhir evaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ,
S04jnalokau:33_0_0: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena tasyā adṛśyā arūpiṇyā akalpyāyā avikalpāyāś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntāyā anutpannāniruddhāyā
S04jnalokau:33_0_1: vākpathasamatikrāntāyāś cittamanovijñānāpagatāyā mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdena sarve trayastriṃśatkāyikā devāḥ saṃcoditā bhītās
S04jnalokau:33_0_2: trastā udvignodvignāḥ [JĀA_30] sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmārāmaratiratā viharanti /
S04jnalokau:33_3: śakraś ca devānām indras tasmin samaye sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ praviśya dharmāsane niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04jnalokau:34_0: yadā ca mañjuśrīr asurā devaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayanti /
S04jnalokau:34_1: tatra yadā trayastriṃśā devāḥ parābhavaṃ gacchanti /
S04jnalokau:34_3: yena śabdenāsurā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ palāyanti /
S04jnalokau:35_0: na ca mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādharmadundubheḥ kaścit saṃpādayitā vātmabhāvo vā saṃvidyate /
S04jnalokau:36_0: atha ca mañjuśrīs trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvaparikarmakṛtānāṃ mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04jnalokau:37_0: yathā mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādundubher adṛśyo 'nātmabhāvo 'nālokyo 'sann abhūto 'cinto 'cetano 'nimitto [JĀA_31] 'rūpy aruto 'bhāvo 'dvayaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ,
S04jnalokau:37_1: pūrvakarmavipākena trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye śabdo niścarati /
S04jnalokau:37_3: sa ca dharmaśabdas trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:38_0: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'dṛśyo 'nālokyo 'nātmabhāvo 'sann abhūto 'citto 'cetano 'nimitto 'rūpy aruto 'dvayo 'bhāvaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ /
S04jnalokau:39_0: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ pūrvakarmavipākena yathāśayādhimuktyā dharmaśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:39_1: sa ca dharmaśabdaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:39_2: dharmasvaranirghoṣeṇa tathāgataghoṣasvara iti loke saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S04jnalokau:40_1: atha ca dharmasvaraghoṣeṇa tathāgata iti prajñaptir loke saṃbhavati /
S04jnalokau:40_2: sattvānām eva pūrvakuśalakarmavipākena tathāgataśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:40_3: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhajananārthaṃ pramattānāṃ ca saṃcodanārthaṃ śabdo niścarati /
S04jnalokau:40_4: te mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā tathāgataṃ saṃkalpayanti /
S04jnalokau:41_0: ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca tathāgatārambaṇakuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ tathāgatavāk śrūyate /
S04jnalokau:41_1: api tv anutpanno 'niruddho mañjuśrīs tathāgato veditavyaḥ /
S04jnalokau:43_0_0: tadyathā mañjuśrīr nidāghakālāvasāne varṣāṇāṃ prathame māsy āgate sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākena pṛthivīgatānāṃ bījagrāmabhūtagrāmasya
S04jnalokau:43_0_1: sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ saṃjananārtham upari vaihāyasy āntarīkṣa ākāśe tādṛśā vāyavo vānti /
S04jnalokau:43_1: yenodakaṃ saṃbhavati / saṃbhūtaṃ ca mahāpṛthivyāṃ prapatati /
S04jnalokau:43_2: tena ca sarvī mahāpṛthivī saṃtarpitā bhavati /
S04jnalokau:43_3: sarve jambūdvīpakāś ca sattvās tasmin samaye pramuditā bhavanti /
S04jnalokau:44_0: yasmin khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samaya upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho na nipatati,
S04jnalokau:44_1: tasmin samaye sarvajambūdvīpakāḥ sattvā evaṃ cintayanti /
S04jnalokau:44_2: nātra meghaḥ saṃbhavati / yadā tu mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān vāriskandho mahāpṛthivyāṃ nipatati,
S04jnalokau:44_3: sattvā evaṃ vadanti / aho mahāmegho vāri pramuñcati saṃtarpayati mahāpṛthivīm iti /
S04jnalokau:44_4: na punar atra mañjuśrīr megho vā meghaprajñaptir vā vidyate /
S04jnalokau:44_5: vātasaṃjanito mañjuśrīr upary antarīkṣād mahān udakaskandho nipatati /
S04jnalokau:45_0: yathā mañjuśrīs tasya vāriskandhasyopary antarīkṣe vātasaṃkṣobheṇa saṃvāryamāṇasya muñcato vāri megha iti prajñaptir bhavati /
S04jnalokau:45_2: na punar atra mañjuśrīr meghaḥ saṃvidyate,
S04jnalokau:45_3: na meghaprajñaptiḥ / [JĀA_33] anutpanno 'niruddho mañjuśrīr meghaś cittagatyanavatāra āgatigativinirmuktaḥ /
S04jnalokau:46_0_0: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ pūrvakuśalamūlasaṃbhāropacitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhajñānābhiprāyāṇām

S04jnalokau:129_7_1: aniruddhā [JĀA_61] anācārā apracārā asamudācārā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ /

S04jnalokau:179_2: yo buddhakoṭīdaśa pūjayed ṛddhyā samākramya daśāsu dikṣu /
S04jnalokau:179_3: vandāpayet sa puruṣāṃś ca sarvān kṛtvā kṛpāṃ sarvasukheṣv agṛddhaḥ // 2 //
S04jnalokau:179_5: yaś cedaṃ sūtraṃ jinadharmasūcakaṃ parasya deśeta muhūrtakaṃ pi /
S04jnalokau:179_6: prasannacittaḥ sugatasya śāsana idaṃ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṃ viśiṣyate // 3 //
S04jnalokau:179_8: sa tīkṣṇaprajñaś ca mahābalaś ca buddhāna bhūmiṃ labhate ca śīghram // 4 //
S04jnalokau:179_9: kathāṃ śruṇitvā sugatānam īdṛśaṃ saṃśrāvayed yaś ca dvitīyasattve /
S04jnalokau:179_10: teṣāṃ ca buddhāna narottamānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ nirupādhiśeṣe // 5 //
S04jnalokau:179_12: chatraiḥ patākais tatha ghaṇṭaśabdaiḥ pariṇāhavante hi yathā bhavāgram // 6 //
S04jnalokau:179_14: icche tv ayaṃ kaścid iha bodhisattvaḥ sūtraṃ śruṇitvā ima evarūpam /
S04jnalokau:179_15: kāye pratiṣṭhāpayi pustake vā idaṃ tataḥ puṇyaphalaṃ viśiṣyate // 7 //
S04jnalokau:179_16: yo bodhisattvo imu dharmu dhārayed apanītamāccharyamalo viśāradaḥ /
S04jnalokau:179_17: puṇyaṃ bhavet tasya hi aprameyaṃ labheta bodhiṃ ca yathepsitena // 8 //
S04jnalokau:179_18: idaṃ hi sūtraṃ sugataiḥ praśastaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bahubodhisattvaiḥ /
S04jnalokau:179_19: tathāgatānām iha-m-ātmabhāva ākāśadhātve hi sarveṣu darśitaḥ // 9 //
S04jnalokau:181_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āryamañjuśrīr bodhisattvaḥ,
S04jnalokau:181_1: te ca daśadiganantāparyantāśeṣalokadhātusaṃnipatitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā iti ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
S04jnalokau:183_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
